reviewText: I've always wanted to know more about this historical event. I was delighted to buy such an informative documentary. Thank you!
I loved this documentary. The art and the history of the art (especially during this fascinating period) was amazing. I learned a lot and enjoyed it!
A great introduction to the change in the art world
I purchased this for my son who is taking an art history class. He is using it to supplement his reading.  It is informative and gives a good understanding of the subject.
This is a great Doc. For any seasoned or just beginning art enthusiasts. I highly recommend!!!!!!!

I bought this and I'm going to watch it again.  Very well done and nicely narrated.  The only thing I didn't like was the fake Teddy Roosevelt -- not needed!  Just his comments would have been enough.  But this is an excellent film.
